document_data.name: Kraliqh
document_data.mainbody: The '''Kraliqh''' family was a merchant house based in [[Arabel]] in [[Cormyr]] in the midâ€“14th century [[DR]].<ref>
document_data.Base: The House of Kaliqh stood by the southwest wall of Arabel. They had a warehouse near the center of the city.
document_data.Activities: The Kraligh family made their income from real estate.
